price: Haya tunayo kusomea ni katika Aya na Ukumbusho wenye hikima.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
footnotes: Hayo tuliyo kusimulia ni miongoni ya hoja zenye kuonyesha ukweli wa ujumbe wako, nayo ni katika Qur'ani Tukufu yenye kukumbusha, na yenye kukusanya ilimu ya manufaa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
